# Importing Data Set

Data source: [Footystats](https://footystats.org/) [Transfermarkt](https://www.transfermarkt.com.tr/) [Sofascore](https://www.sofascore.com/)

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| output: false
# Load required libraries
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)

# Correct the file path (use double backslashes or forward slashes)
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/USER/Desktop/merged_superlig_team_performance.xlsx")

# Save the data as an RData file
save(data, file = "cousinanalytics.RData")
```

```         
{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)

# Read the data
data <- read_excel("C:/Users/USER/Desktop/merged_superlig_team_performance.xlsx")

# Display the entire data set
kable(data, caption = "Complete Superlig Team Performance Data")
```
